content.description:
Video in somnio venisse amicum ad ianuam
carceriscarcer, carceris, m.: jail cell et pulsare vehementer.
content.question: In the sentence, what does pulsare mean?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
